metadata.title: CVE-2020-13112 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexif before 0.6.22. Several buffer over-readsin EXIF MakerNote handling could lead to information disclosure andcrashes. This is different from CVE-2020-0093.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13112` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-6ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-6ubuntu0.3').
